Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 9.
